StatDef.label: fear susceptibility
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists fear caused by the Superhero Genes mod. The lower this is, the less susceptibile the pawn is to fear.\n\nThis will have a different effect depending on what the source is. If the fear source is an ability, then this impacts how long the ability lasts for that particular pawn. If the source is a damaging attack, then this will influence how much fear increases per attack.

StatDef.label: super stun susceptibility
StatDef.description: How well this creature resists stun attacks caused by the Superhero Genes mod. The lower this is, the less susceptibile the pawn is to a super's stun attacks, thus reducing how long they last.\n\nThis only impacts stuns from standard super abilities. Stuns from something like psionics often use a different stat to determine resistance.
